participant_1.background:
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
i have a dog and two cats.
I watch old Thierry Henry videos to cheer myself up.
I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
I have started to make plans for my retirement, including where I want to live and what I want to do with my time.

participant_2.background:
I don't have any kids because I'm focused on my career.
I love doing zumba to get my heart rate up and feel younger.
I enjoy helping my sister Madonna with her beauty business and selling cosmetics.
I value honesty in a relationship, and I want my partner to be supportive of my passions.
I'm always ready to defend myself, but I'm also a big fan of comedy.

content.text: Hi there! My name is Madonna. What's yours?
I'm Ryan. Nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too, Ryan. What do you do for a living?
I'm a chef. I love to cook and experiment with new flavors.
That's awesome! I love to cook too, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry, everyone has to start somewhere. I've been cooking for years and I'm still learning new things.
Thanks for the encouragement. Maybe I'll take a cooking class sometime.
That's a great idea! You might be surprised at how much you enjoy it.
What kind of food do you like to cook?
I like to cook all kinds of food, but my favorite is probably Italian food.
I love Italian food too! What's your favorite Italian dish to cook?
I love making pasta. I have a few different recipes that I like to make, but my go-to is a simple spaghetti with tomato sauce.
That sounds delicious. I love spaghetti.
I'm glad you like it. It's a really easy dish to make, and it's always a hit with my family and friends.
I'm sure it is. I'm going to have to try making it sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'll love it
